content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night around 23:00 and saturn and mars were out so i thought i would take my telescope and look at them  after about 15 minutes i got tired of looking so i thought i would look for shooting stars and satellites, then around 23:30 i saw 3-4 white lights, they all looked like satellites but they were all moving together, really fast, too fast to be satellites, and they were all flying in a triangle or a rhombus shape, not as if they were flying in a formation, but as if they were connected to an object in the shape of a triangle or rhombus, and it made no sound. now i live right next to an air force base and i get how people would think i just saw a military aircraft, but i'm an airplane type guy and i stay on top of what's coming in and going out and the weirdest thing we have is the f-35 and even it would make sound and not move so fast, and airplanes have red, green, and white lights, not all white ones. i want to say i also saw the silhouette of the object but i can't be sure, it moved across the  sky so fast, by the time i saw it it had already made it's way 90 degrees above my head and i lost sight of it around 40-35 degrees i saw it for about 3-5 seconds, if it were flying at 4000 feet it would appear to be moving at 900 nm but like i said it was totally quiet so it had to be much higher than that, or some unknown technology that can break the sound barrier without making so much as a clap. later after i saw it i saw sort of a streak of light that may have been a meteor but it was a really bright orange and seemed to curve as it went down around 30-25 degrees above the horizon i saw that around 23:45. so yeah that is what i saw i'll stay up tonight and see if i can get a photo or something if it comes back
content.summary: 3-4 white lights appeared to be connected to an object moving very fast in the shape of a triangle or rhombus

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i must have been 10 at the time which would put this in 2002. it was summer but the exact date and time of the event i am not sure of and are merely estimations on my part. 

it was roughly mid-day. the sun was high in the sky and it was a perfectly clear day. we were out in the front yard doing some yard work. my father noticed an object in the sky east of where we were and pointed it out. it was roughly 60 degrees in elevation. a perfect, metallic sphere. it looked similar to something like brushed stainless steel. metallic but not a mirror/chrome reflection. it was clearly visible and had no external features. it seemed quite high up but not as high as commercial jet aircraft usually are, maybe closer to the altitude and speed of a smaller private single engine aircraft. it's size and altitude were hard to estimate since there were no reference points in sky to use. i would say it was roughly over pubnico harbor at 1000 to 2000 feet in altitude. it was moving at a constant speed and direction, from south west to north east. the altitude remained visibly the same. there was no sound and no other aircraft in the area at that time.

it traveled to the other side of the house. i walked around the house to see if i could see it again. i did, it was still traveling in the same path and eventually traveled far enough away that i couldn't see it any more.

our first thought was that it may be a balloon. ether a large mylar party balloon or a weather balloon. however balloons of any type are rarely spherical in shape, usually have strings tied to them and in the case of weather balloons, usually have instruments hanging underneath. they also tend to spin and swirl in the wind which would make them appear to change shape from the ground. this did not and maintained a perfect round shape which leads me to believe it was a sphere or always facing the same direction towards us. it did not behave like any balloon i had observed before or to this day.

i was more curious than anything when i saw it. if i would have been old enough to drive i would have attempted to follow it by road. i am fairly familiar with the various operations and types of aircraft and space craft. this was not a plane, helicopter or any other type of conventional aircraft and i have yet to see anything quite like it.
content.summary: Metallic sphere moving in a straight line across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the porch i observed 2 bright lights appear in the ne sky. the lights were moving nw. the objects separated and continued nw. the objects brightened and moved closer together and then separated and then disappeared. witnessed by myself and granddaughter at approximately 9:05 pm. we were both in awe of what we were seeing. at first i thought it may be a meteor but the object did not behave in a manor that would be associated with a meteor.There was no trail and both lights blinked out within seconds of each other.
content.summary: 2 bright lights appeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Watching world cup on 4th july 2014 just before 4.45pm went to window and saw an object move across from west to north east.It was so clear i saw the top of the saucer and the back of the it was metallic and flashed in the sun it seemed like the  material used by astronauts as it looked like a visor and the colours were like those used on the visors of astronauts and the nearest i can describe was the colours were psychodelic.I was so shocked i could not get a camera.So the whole dome was like this and presumably the pilot was beneath the visor.
the craft seemed to follow the same line but it moved slightly on an angle.
the next view before it went behind a building was it moved onto its side and i could see the disc shape which was a complete 360 degree circular .It was matt black and there did not appear to be anything other than a base.No lights no landing gear nothing.
as i have seen other things this finally proved to be 100 percent true it was clear and the disc shape was classic ufo.
the building opposite me has security cameras but the angle of the camera that points in the direction of the sighting seems slightly low.But if it is zoomed out it may have recorded it .There are a couple more cameras down the street .I am sure one of the cameras has caught this.
but my feeling of fulfilment at actually seeing a classic ufo is immense.I have just reached my 65th birthday and have seen objects particularly when i was 11.I dont know what happened to me then , but i have always believed in ufo's and now i have been lucky enough to see one up close.
content.summary: Slowly moved across my eye line ,was moving left to right on the top was a metallic dome turned on its side and was a complete disc

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette and then i looked out to the east sky and i saw 5-6 round lights in a cloud come on for 1-2 seconds and then go off. i only saw it once and then i went back inside.
content.summary: In eastern sky, i think i saw 5-6 round light in a cloud go on for about 1-2 seconds then go off.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of july 4, 2014 shortly after fireworks around the lake started, two of us witnessed a relatively low flying red orb (described it as egg shaped) in the sky from the ne traveling slowly to about nne where it hovered for a minute then traveled n, hovered again then ascended above the low cloud cover. about 10 red orbs individually and sometimes in pairs arriving first from the ne then some from the west. this was going on for over 1 hour. the height of the object were much greater than the fireworks. these orbs moved from below a very low cloud cover slowly moving to stationary points of ne and nw where they stayed for minutes, then slowly traveled toward to north, similar to the first sighting, hovering again then ascended through cloud cover only to be replaced with others somewhere else. not fireworks, chinese lanterns or flares - aircraft were visible because of navigation lights on normal path to airport in other directions and paths and no helicopters in area. 

we both admit to believing in ufo's although never before claiming to have seen anything that made us stop to really wonder. we can not break this down into any logical conclusion other than these were definitely unidentified objects. today we still believe we have witnessed something extraordinary. 

i was able to take high res photos with a pentax k5 digital camera with 60-250mm zoom lens at full zoom and 6400 iso about 1/5 second at f4 steadied on a railing. photos were then processed through dxoptics 8 software and enlarged to 400% which clearly showed cone shaped red-orange emissions around a hot white center. raw digital photo files available for more accurate interpretation. the last photo i have sent was from my iphone only to show relative position in the sky from our vantage point.
content.summary: Red-orange ball entered from ne to n and w to n, hovering for minute then continuing n

content.detailedDescription:
A hot evening finding it difficult to sleep, in my bed i can see clearly out of my window at a large portion of the sky. then, a light darted across the night sky at an amazing speed.

i have been to many airshows and the like and am aware of the kind of speeds at which aircraft can travel, this was in a totally different league. it arched over the night sky at terrific speed emitting  bright pea green light. what struck me also was the proportion of light it cast over the ground and in my room was far greater than the light source. the word 'glow' does not do it justice, it was far brighter. comparable to modern led police car lights flashing through a window into ones house, but perhaps still brighter, and of course in this encounter a constant light, and one must say while incredibly bright all round, as it passed me and began to go into the distance the craft seemed to emit more light from its stern side.

as it passed at a fairly low altitude it most certainly hummed, and i witnessed the doppler effect so i am certain it came from the craft. a fairly high pitched hum, very abnormal, as i say i am familiar with aircraft the world over and this was most certainly no conventional noise such as a jet or turboprop.

i lost sight of it as the width of my window naturally did not give me scope enough to see it continue its flight. i rushed outside onto my garden to see it but it had disappeared, i expected as much because at the speed it was going it was probably about another 5 or more miles away in the approximately 15 seconds it took me to get outside.

5 minutes later, what was definitely a human craft flew by, i know the flight paths in my county off the back of my hand including military flight paths and over my house they travel dead west, or dead east. this aircraft was not, it was flying in the same direction as the ufo. it was far to dark to see it clearly among the clouds, it was travelling at the bottom of the cloud layer, occasionally revealing itself. possibly an raf hercules, but due to their tactical role as a transporter i doubt one of those would have been deployed in pursuit of a ufo. i just can't say what aircraft it was but it was definitely a four engined propeller aircraft.

i say 7 minutes in my report because that was the time with this suspicious identifiable aircraft included, but my time seeing the actual green orb blast through the sky was about 8 seconds.
content.summary: Green humming light as fast as lightning, flying low through the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was hot summer night at approx 10 pm perth australia , i was lying in a portable hammock outside admiring the clear view of the milky way.  just west of where i was i noticed the outline of a shape in the sky about the size of a 747 jet but it was shaped like a pear, narrow and rounded at the front and broadening out at the back, all the shape was rounded, no straight edges. it's shape was very clear as it was a pitch black silluette against a very clear starlit sky. there was no moon at that time. the vehicle was flying at approx 500 to 600 ft at about 200 mph and slowly accelerating  heading due nth. the strangest thing was there was no lights, no sound and no emissions. the vehicle blotted out the stars as it flew across.  i called to my wife and said hurry, come and check this out. she came out side and i pointed to the vehicle, she could see it too. we watched it fly nth until we couldn't see it no more. as it flew away it appeared to slowly accelerate..  my first thoughts on this was that it may have been a stealth bomber but there just wasn't any sound.
content.summary: Large pear shape black craft blotting out back ground stars flyin north silently  at approx 200mphii

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a cigarette and noticed a craft of unknown type in easterly direction from me, it was emitting lots of different colours, and was hovering in one spot.  the thing that made me notice it is that i've never seen such displays of colour and hovering/movements of this object in other airborne craft such as planes and helicopters.  i observed it for a long time, it would hover in one spot blinking different colour light patterns, then it would move straight down, sometimes sideways in a rapid motion or slowly at other times.  i kept trying to take photos of it on my iphone which wasn't giving me very good results.  i went inside the house to get my partner to come outside to show her this object.  she got her nikon camera with a zoom lens, and did her best to get the camera to focus on this object, which was proving difficult.  she managed to take a few photos that came out really well which showed a triangular shaped object with lights along the edge.  it was not possible to judge the shape of the craft with the naked eye.  i also tried to take video footage on my iphone, it was difficult to hold the phone perfectly still, and i ended up resting my arm on a table in order to hold the phone as still as possible.  i also tried to include the clothes line as a reference point and to be able to judge the objects movements. after observing it for some 80 minutes, the object slowly moved lower and lower and away from my vantage point until i could no longer see it over the trees.  it was difficult for me to tell whether it landed somewhere or just disappeared over the horizon.  during the sighting i was puzzled and kept trying to imagine what it could possibly be,  as i had never seen anything resembling what i observed.
content.summary: Unusual craft, lots of blinking lights, moving in an odd way

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside on my patio facing east when a brilliant red light/object steadily flew in a straight horizontal pathway from north to south faster than a commercial passenger airline. it was difficult to judge the exact distance that it was away from me but it appeared to be flying over the cascade mountain range, which is approx. 20-30 miles from where i'd stood. it's flight pathway location appeared to be within 20 miles south of mt. st. helens as it headed towards portland, or. 

while in mid flight it stopped and hovered and then zipped north for a short stretch, then stopped and flew to a northeastern direction and then headed east; (as if they'd missed a turn at an intersection and so backed up to take a left turn). it was very bright red to the naked eye and was not flashing nor generating any sound. i took 3 separate pics, ran into the house to get my vid recorder as i watched it instantly zip out of sight northeast to east. 

when i'd returned outside within seconds, there was nothing visible. i had taken the pics at the turning of the clock, one pic is recorded with 10:57pm and the other two at 10:58pm. i instantly went back into the house to look at the pics on my pc and experienced a delay in the performance of my pc while up loading the sd card. when it'd finally loaded the pics it was 11:18pm but did not seem to me that 21 minutes had elapsed. i then attempted to call in to "ground zero with clyde lewis" on my landline but experienced a terrible scramble in the communication connection which had sounded like underwater gargling sounds when the radio station screener had answered my phone call. i then tried using my cell phone and had gotten the same response. by this time, it was after 11:30 pm and had felt to me like a time shift had occurred. i then looked at the photos and only one had the object in it. so i posted it to my fb site and then tried to lighten the photo to see a clearer version of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Near mt. st. helens, washington state on july 16, 2014 at 10:57pm, i saw a bright red light/object flying fast. it had no flashing lights nor sound. it stopped in mid flight and hovered and then switched directions and quickly went out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke a cigarette on the porch. i saw a light come on for a few seconds, then go out. then i saw a second one come on a very short distance from were first light came on. at first i thought it might be fire flies. then i took a better look and there were six objects flying in a half oval shape in fomation. they were evenly spaced and moving a a slow rate of speed. i don't believe they were aircraft. moving too slow and would have stalled out. also the normal red/green navigation lights were missing on all six. when they were not lighted they were non visable to my eye sight. by the way, on clouds in the sky and a 1/2 moon.
the six moved in close formation that would be illegal for civilan air craft, and made no noise at all. i know military helicoptors and planes, these were not either. i live way out in the country and would have heard engine noise. i called for my wife and brother to get out here and look at the objects when i relized they were headed into the horizon tree top level line. they didn't make it in time to see the objects. i just felt someone needed to know what i saw that wouldn't think i needed to be in a rubber room. the formation looked like below.

            o                              o
                  o                  o
                         o      o
content.summary: Six lights in a semi oval flight path individuly glowing then dark, then on again. moving n-w about 100 yards apart.

content.detailedDescription:
In november 2012, i went to the terrace of my building and i just slept over there and was looking at the sky. in 10 to 15 minutes i saw 7 boomerang shaped yellow colored beams with no shine. means it wasn't glowing.I instantly got up.I was feeling very excited and pretty happy as i am always fond of mysterious stuff.Then i tried to take a photograph by my camera.But at that time it was gone very far from me.So i got fail to take any photograph.It traveled from north to south.
but i only saw that 7 beams.I did not saw any edges.That thing traveled very swiftly with no noise and anything.Then after 30 to 40 minutes i lost sight of the object.Then i went to the home.I told everything to my parents.As expected they did not trust me.
content.summary: 7 boomerang shaped yellow colored beams in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was working outside just after my lunch break. out of the corner of my eye i noticed what looked to be a reddish copper colored object in sky to my left. i stood up straight and really focused on the object. it appeared to have lights and a surface that reflected light off as metal does. it was also black at times as well. it appeared to hover for awhile and very slowly travel on a path that changed slightly as it progressed through the sky. i have to stress one thing. the first time i noticed this thing, it was directly over the airport. my company is building condos and houses beside our cities airport and it is closed airspace. nothing public or private can fly with out authorization. which leads to why i was curious as to what this slow moving completely silent object was. at first i thought it to be a hot air ballon but i asked myself. why would it be and who allowed it to fly directly over the airport and the landing strips. that would create a chance of an airplane crashing into it or the ground. it took about 3 hours to get almost right over my head. as it was moving around and stopping during these hours i began to notice it looked more like a metal upside down bell rather then a air ballon made from fabric. i really don't claim to know what it is because i have never seen anything like it before. there was what looked like a bright light on it as well. it never got any dimmer or changed color but just stayed constant. it was completely silent as it traveled trough the sky. i stopped randomly between working and snapped a series of maybe 7 pictures. i tried the video recorder but detriment did the object simply dissapeared from sight. it would not show up on video but clear as day in pictures. the object turned slightly as it moved so the pics show different details and angles. but you guys tell me what this is. i couldn't find any records of arial pictures of city nor reports of anything happening at airport. when the object just simply disappeared and i could not see it anywhere in sky i thought this to be extremely wierd. seeing as it had taken so long to get to my location and i could see it anywhere in the horizon. it's like it never happened really. only proof is pictures. after object was gone 2 army jets made multiple passes over the area. returning then flying off again out of site only to return and do this again. i'm at a loss as to what i saw and am not discounting anything. as long as it's realistic and logical.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was working outside when i noticed an object in the sky. it was an object i could not identify. i snapped a series of pics with my cell phone

content.detailedDescription:
Driving though utah to idaho

after i took the picture i looked at it and noticed the orb and it seems to be keeping up with us through idaho, which i did not get a pic of it but now in oregon it is here once again

i could not see it with my own eyes oh in an image 

it first appeared as a standstill pink glowing orb with a green round dot in it wnd then te reflection of  the photo i am sending there are rainbow reflections bouncing off the sun

in oregon tonight i first captured it as a green orb then again as a pink blur moving closer to the sun and finally the pink glowing orb with a green round dot inside of it. i would be glad to send you those images as well

the drive was beautiful in utah and there was a sensation of belonging, peace and comfort to the land. i felt very calm and after words i felt in awe because it was so beautiful

weird thing is at night i got an image of a strange bird like image that looked like clouds. though in one of my photos and this i saw in real life not after the picture was taken but it had two green glowing eyes. it seemed like i should have been afraid though i thought it was amazing and i felt this weird feeling of heaven and hell like the struggles our ancestors had gone through in the way past. though a feeling of balance of good and bad was still with me. it was a really neat sight to see

i would gladly send you them if you would like
content.summary: The sun was setting and as i took a picture the orb showed up. i also took a photo tonight in oregon & got a green round orb and as the sun came closer to us the orb appeared to have a pink shape over it

content.detailedDescription: As we were looking out at the water from the beach we noticed a flying orange/red lit up ball hovering over the water that moved from east to west and eventually stopped over the water and descent below sea level. there was a report of something similar to this about a month ago.
content.summary: Flying lit up object in gulf shores

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were enjoying the afternoon in our back yard.  the sky was crystal clear and it was around 7:35pm.  i sat down on the patio chair and happened to look up and see a passing airliner overhead (it was very high...Probably 35k-40k ft).  there was a very bright star-like object seemingly not far from the plane.  i told my wife to have a look at the star and even mentioned how odd it was for it to be so bright considering how much daylight was left.  as we both were watching, the airliner passed overhead and the object quickly ascended and dimmed until out of sight.  it did not move laterally at all.  it was quite obvious that it ascended at a high rate of speed.  my wife and i could only look at each other in amazement and confusion and ask ourselves what it was that we saw.  it ascended out of sight apprx. 10 seconds after the airliner passed by it.  with 100% certainty i can say that it was not a star, plane, nor satellite.  it didn't dawn on us what we were witnessing until it was gone, thus no pictures or videos were taken.
content.summary: Star-like object appears in clear blue sky and ascends quickly out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: So it was kind of late night, random just hanging. this man came running down the road yelling for everybody to come outside, so everybody rushed outside. the fire orbs were shooting out the corner of the sky fast forming shapes, then vanishing like they were never there. my first thought was is the world ending? ( i know be serious, right) but..I felt like it was another intelligence.There were probably about 15 people outside and out of everybody i was burned by it. i see things all the time since it's happened.About a week after my siting someone submitted a video to their news exactly like what i witnessed. the news here could only say it was aliens.Experiencing that definitely opened my eyes up to a lot of things, we are not alone. sorry for the language in the video!!
content.summary: Kind of late night, random.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in my bedroom when i felt an strong urge to look up and out of my bedroom window. this was unusual as it was approximately 3.30am in the morning. immediately i noticed a large disc on edge less than 200 feet away with 12 small white lights in groups of three, rotating around the disk travelling across my line of sight, just above the rooftops.
my first reaction was "wow there's a ufo" with absolutely no chance of mis-identification.  
i would estimate that it was between 100 and 200 feet in the air and the disc looked like it was on edge with the small white lights in triangular groups of three rotating about the center of the disk. i got the impression i was looking at the bottom of the vehicle.
i was very surprised that i had woken up just as this ufo flew past my window , i now feel that this was not a coincidence. my  wife heard me wake and state "wow look a ufo!"but she did not look up and went back to sleep. the craft traveled completely silently across my field of vision from the northeast to an eastern direction less than 200 feet above the rooftops in less than 10 seconds disappearing behind the trees in the back gardens. 
the whole event happened to quickly for any picture to have been taken.
however i am sure that this was no craft of earthly origin.
content.summary: A disc on edge less than 200 feet away with 12 lights in groups of three rotating around the disk

content.detailedDescription: The wife and i were sitting in the backyard from roughly 11pm to 12:30am. i happened to be looking up maybe 20-25 degrees to the w and noticed an extremely fast orb of light (unsure if solid or simply light) heading s from behind my tree. i could not get a sense of how far away it was. it was also very cloudy, so much so you could not see the stars through the clouds. i didn't say anything to the wife but then she pointed to the se sky a couple seconds later stating she saw a "light" streak through the sky and disappear (she was roughly facing the opposite direction as me). we continued to search for the orb toward the s/se tree lines. a few minutes later we saw it ascend from the se tree line, then immediately descend and disappear. we could not get a sense of altitude or distance. as far as feelings, we were both very excited as we have never seen anything like that before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb-like light headed on a curved path se.  lost sight of it then saw it ascend, stop, then immediately descend at tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 31 through the town of corsicana texas around 7 o'clock.  the reflective object in sky caught my attention and i observed it thinking that it did not look like a plane or anything i have seen before. it was flying too low and too fast an was too small to be a plane. also it did not have wings or leave a trail. it did travel in one path until it dissapeared from sight. almost like it left the atmosphere or cloaked itself. the whole thing lasted 2 miles and maybe 3 minutes. but i knew it was nothing i was familiar with.
content.summary: Witnessed reflective object in sky while driving watched it travel sometimes liked white sometimes reflective then it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
A growing bright white light over the top of the puig campana mountain, they grow and shrink a few times and sudently starts to fade, after 3 seconds aprox a red one light apears near the white one, and then a few more (like four) little lights make a line just following the red, after 5 seconds aprox, all the lights faded slowly. 

una luz blanca brillante sobre la monta��a puig campana, crecia y se encogia varias veces cuando de repente de empez�� a desvanecer, aproximadamente unos 3 segundos despues, aparece una luz roja un poco mas peque��a que la blanca y poco despues, unas cuatro luces mas rojizas aparecen formando una linea con la roja grande. tras unos cinco segundos todas las luces rojas se desvanecen lentamente.
content.summary: Growing bright white light and a red light with a line of little lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work in bolton, through little lever towards bury at 2am on tues 15th july 2014. i noticed a very bright white light high in the sky ahead of me. i didn't think too much of it at first just thought it was a low plane. i noticed when i had a side view of the light it had a very bright red light that was flickering almost strobing & due to the large size & brightness of the red light i found myself watching it as i drove. it was at this point i realised it could not have been a plane or helicopter because of the way it moved. it wasn't particularly fast but it alternated between hovering & changing direction, all directions. i pulled over to watch & after a couple of minutes i was convinced it was not anything i had seen before. the red strobe light was amazing to watch & i then noticed it was getting a bit bigger & that there was also a green light but not as big or as bright as the red. i got my camera phone & took a couple of pictures but very disappointingly they were very grainy and dark & the lights were moving between the gaps between the houses so i never caught it on camera. i drove up the street and parked again to get a better look through the gaps and then watched for another few minutes (probably watched for 5-8mins in total) before deciding i should just head home. as i drove away the red strobe light was getting bigger & brighter & i felt a little uneasy at this point so i decided to drive home on main roads rather than the quieter more rural roads i normally drive home. as i turned a corner onto bury bolton road i saw the light were a lot bigger i slowed down & watched from my drivers side window i was about to stop & get my phone out again when it seemed to be slowing lowering & then its shape slowly appeared as if through a light cloud but it was lower than the clouds. it was a very dark/black triangular shaped object & it appeared to be large. it was still slowly lowering & at this point i became very spooked & felt i couldn't even look at it anymore, it was a very disturbing experience & i just wanted to get away & get home, i continued to drive home again along the main roads rather than my usual route as i felt extremely uneasy. i did notice the object rose again & the red light was still visible up in the sky. this experience has disturbed me & i'm not quite sure what to do about it. i would love to hear from anyone who saw these lights or object on this day as i believe there is no way anyone out at that time in the area did not see it too.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a big very bright red light flickering, almost strobing before descending enough to show itself as a large, black triangular shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had just parked our car, it was around 7.50pm and already dark, and as we got out of the car we noticed a blue white light rather like an led but much bigger just to the west of us and apparently just above a block of flats. i said "what on earth is that?" my husband replied that he thought it was a helicopter. i said " then why is it silent ? besides, helicopter lights do not look like that" he agreed with this and we were both watching it all this time, and then i added "why has the light got no beam, it's very odd". we watched it for another 30 seconds or so to see if it would do anything, it didn't, i then said "i have the feeling it is watching us" i then waved to it! my husband thought i was crackers and said so,then said " you know, you're right, it's no aircraft light i've ever seen" we watched it for a few more moments and it just blinked out. it didn't leave, it just wasn't there anymore. we walked towards our home and i said that we ought to report it, hubby said "who to, no one will believe us". the whole thing lasted about 3 minutes.
hubby and i disagree on the distance it was from us but my reasoning was this - we were around 10m from a 10m high building and the blue white light was visible and around 10 o'clock high above the building and appeared to be around 0.4 of a meter wide.

six months later i saw a similar light in the east of the same location at 5.30am travelling at a tremendous speed through the clouds going north to south, i thought it may be a satellite but friends told me they never travel north to south so, i don't know then. it was also blue white though whiter than the earlier sighting, but it was the speed of it that i remember most, i have never seen an aircraft cover that area in that time.
looking out of a first storey window from visible horizon to horizon around 4 seconds at about 10 o'clock high again, and also totally silent. i expected a sonic boom at that speed but nothing. it was just a light, no craft visible.
content.summary: A light suddenly appeared, noiseless,motionless, no beam, then flicked off.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i where having a cigarette outside in the woods just before midnight, when we notice that something was moving up and down just above the tree line, it was a bright red triangle  shape craft, then suddenly it stop moving and just stay there hovering making no sound, then we came got on the car but i wasn't able to make it work, then the radio became crazy, changing stations without us touching it, we got off the car and started getting closer to the object by foot, when we came closer we notice some strange patterns on the outside of the craft, and suddenly it released three or maybe for smaller objects, by this time i was terrified like never before, then the smaller orbs got closer to us, and the last thing i know is waking up in the middle of the woods 5 hours later, we were not able of remembering anything, and the craft was nowhere to be found.  

i would like to talk to someone about it, but im scared of the mocking.
content.summary: Its been the most terrifying event in my life

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my building terrace (7 floors building) at approximately 4am on 3/28/2014. 

i usually spend sometime on the terrace in night to watch and track approaching and departing commercial flights in mumbai airspace. please note that the airspace specifically above mira road is very active with traffic due to its geographical location near mumbai airport. around 40% of the air traffic flies over the mira road region, including the flights which over-passes mumbai. i use flightradar24 application on my smartphone to track these flights just for fun, so i'm very well aware of how a airplane in a night sky looks like.

so on 3/28/2014 at 4am i noticed a steady white light (approx 1-2 kms high) moving relatively faster (around 500+ knots) than other planes from sw to ne direction. i noticed that this particular flight was not showing up in flightradar24, which is not uncommon. i had noticed earlier that some flights do not show up on flightradar24 and the reasons behind this can be many.

but this particular 'flight' didn't have any blinking lights whatsoever, which is usually the case with commercial planes and even with fighter jets.
it only had one steady white light and it was moving very fast and if it was some air force jet, with the speed it was moving it should have made some shock-wave like sound, but there was none.

and in less then 30 seconds this ufo disappeared as if that steady light switched off. it didn't faze-out but disappeared just like that. the night had no cloud cover.

i couldn't take a video or a photo of this sighting since the sky was very dark and the ufo was flying very high. but i have seen a youtube video of a similar sighting with 9+ ufos in night sky, and one of the white steady lights is what i saw, so i have taken a screenshot of that video to show you what i saw.
content.summary: A steady white light moving across the clear night sky (500 knots approx speed) above mira road from sw to ne direction.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my balcony to call a friend. it was 12 midnight exactly. i was feeling sleepy. i yawned and looked upwards to the sky. there was this strange looking perfect circular object in the sky. at first i thought i was dreaming. there was a little moisture in the air. it was raining a little. it was not noticeable. but suddenly the rain increased and at the exact same moment, the circular object started to flash green lights around its circumference. the lights flashed after every 2 seconds. the object started to hover around the sky. i turned on my cell phone's camera and just as i was about to click a picture, my phone mysteriously switched off, without displaying a message. the battery level was around 80%. i tried to turn it on but it didn't help. the phone did not start. i noticed the object's trail. it was circling around. the circular shaped object was circling around in the sky. and suddenly, it disappeared. left no sign. nothing. at the exact same moment, my phone turned on, and the strange part, it was right where it switched off. the camera app was open and it did not capture any image. i saw the time on my phone, it was 12:5:10. i couldn't sleep the whole night.
content.summary: Shocking.

content.detailedDescription: on july 05 2013 i was standing in my driveway when i saw a flash in the southern sky i looked up to see several red orange spheres going from south to north then abruptly change direction and head due east there was aprox 30 to 50 of these that i saw over about a 5 to 7 min period i yelled at my neighbor and tried to get my girlfriend to come quickly to observe the objects she just thought i was crazy so i am not sure of how many others may have seen what i did but i can tell you that i watch the sky alot closer now then i use to thank you. ps i took pictures with my cell phone and none of the pictures showed anything but black sky
content.summary: On july 5 2013 i was standing in my drivway when i looked up into the southern sky an saw an orange colored sphere it was traveling south to north then changed to east sharply there was 30 to 40 of these spheres that from a 1000 1500 ft they were 30-50 ft

content.detailedDescription: We were playing badminton at night. i hit a smash and we were talking for a while. i just saw an object flashing and moving very speed. the size i cannot explain but it is not lager and it is not smaller as well.
content.summary: An object moved in the air at night

content.detailedDescription: i was going to work nightshift at the hospital. i was driving out in the country on a county road with no other cars around and no houses and few trees. flatland. i seen 7 large objects flying too close to the ground in a line and they were red sphere shaped lights with no landing gear or wings or anything that resembled a plane. they were quiet and they were too slow moving and too low to the ground. they were wrong looking and my mind was trying to make sense of them but they were kind of pretty the way they flew. i was very curious.I said out loud to myself i wonder if their connected? then the one on the end went up then down then back in line at the same time as the other one on up the line did. then i wondered if they were answering me and i got scared. they continued on faster now. they went single file to the south with me behind them and we traveled that way until when they got over the city. then they made a sharp turn to the right and up and disappeared in a flash of light. i got to work shaken up and excited and called the police and reported what i seen and the police were not interested. i know what i seen was not normal, whether it was man made from the airbase nearby or not from this world. i'm glad i got to see it and i'm more glad they didn't have time to stop and chat with me, whoever they were.
content.summary: I seen 7 large objects solid red spheres flying too close to ground and too slow

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from seeing my friend i have to go up pittsfield road there's farm land both sides of the road. when i came round the fist corner three was a bright light in the field on .My right. thinking it as a tractor plawing until i was nearer the road bends to the right. i could see it was a cup with three (men)? standing out side it with space suits on i got out of the car and watched them for 20-30minutes. when they saw me they just went in the ufo and took off no sound just start up just blue white light till it was gone.The flies had been plawed there wasn't any mark's not even foot prints but my own.
content.summary: Three human typ in suits around ufo that was flooting about three foot off the forums
